name: MiLu MiLan
description:
"MiLu MiLan"is a casual game of architectural maze exploration and puzzle solving.
MiLan will lead you to experience a beautiful and fantastic adventure, exploring and moving forward in the maze of two-dimensional and three-dimensional visual confusion. When you feel like there is no way out, touch the mechanism and the maze will magically open an unexpected path for you. Successfully pass through the maze and complete the puzzle to collect all 12 gems, save the sealed Elk King, and restore the vitality of the vast and desolate world.
